content:
## SESSION c63e80ae ACHIEVEMENTS (2025-12-11)

RECENT_ACHIEVEMENTS_ADD::[
  "/load command redesigned: 7-tier architecture with 5-specialist consensus (HO-Liaison, Edge-Optimizer, Critical-Engineer, Principal-Engineer, HO)",
  "Load command features: clock_in FAIL-HARD, anchor_submit SOFT-FAIL, --untracked escape hatch, lazy codebase awareness",
  "Cross-session learnings index: clockout now appends to learnings-index.jsonl for agent visibility",
  "5 new clockout tests for learnings extraction (all passing)",
  "Config sync audit: identified load.md drift across 4 projects"
]

CURRENT_STATE_UPDATE::[
  DATE::2025-12-11[18:05],
  BRANCH::fix/issue-120-clockout-pipeline,
  TEST_COUNT::59 clockout tests passing (was 54, added 5 for learnings index)
]

NEW_FEATURES::[
  LOAD_COMMAND_V2::"~/.claude/commands/load.md - 658 lines, 7-tier ecosystem-integrated architecture",
  LEARNINGS_INDEX::"tools/clockout.py - _extract_learnings_keys() + _append_to_learnings_index() methods added"
]

CROSS_SESSION_VISIBILITY::[
  IMPLEMENTED::"clockout appends session learnings/decisions/blockers to .hestai/sessions/learnings-index.jsonl",
  FORMAT::"JSONL append-only (race-condition safe)",
  ENABLES::"Future agents can discover what past sessions learned"
]

SYSTEMIC_INSIGHTS_UPDATE::[
  RESOLVED::"No cross-session visibility mechanism" → NOW IMPLEMENTED via learnings-index.jsonl
]
